name: license-market
short_description: Automated support chat operator for handling customer interactions.
details: Developed an automation system for support chat operators.
Created custom n8n nodes using Node.js to dynamically load operators.
Used n8n for workflow automation and Nginx for efficient request handling.
Deployed and managed services using Docker and tmux on Linux servers.

name: Personal Website
